named-query.name: BC_FIND_STATES
named-query.query: SELECT state FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.State state ORDER BY state.name

named-query.name: BC_FIND_STATES_BY_COUNTRY_ABBREVIATION
named-query.query: SELECT state FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.State state WHERE state.country.abbreviation = :countryAbbreviation ORDER BY state.name
